opis: Prodaje se prekrasna kuća s tri apartmana, smještena u turističkom mjestu Privlaka u okolici Zadra, samo 450 metara od plaže. Svaki apartman ima zaseban ulaz, pružajući potpunu privatnost i komfor. Sastoji se od dvije spavaće sobe, potpuno opremljene kuhinje, prostranog dnevnog boravka, moderne kupaone, hodnika i terase ili balkona, idealnih za opuštanje i uživanje u svježem zraku. Okućnica kuće je pažljivo uređena i puna zelenila, stvarajući oazu mira i privatnosti. Prostor za parkiranje je osiguran u dvorištu zgrade, što je velika prednost za vlasnike i goste. Kuća je idealna za one koji traže miran i opušten život u blizini mora ili kao investiciju za turistički najam. Smještena u mirnom turističkom okruženju, ova nekretnina pruža sve što je potrebno za ugodan i bezbrižan boravak. Blizina plaže omogućava brz i jednostavan pristup morskim radostima, dok lijepo uređena okućnica nudi savršeno mjesto za opuštanje i druženje. Ne propustite priliku za kupnju ove izvanredne nekretnine koja nudi sve što vam je potrebno za udoban život ili uspješno turističko poslovanje u prekrasnom turističkom mjestu Privlaka. Za dodatne informacije i dogovor o razgledavanju, slobodno nas kontaktirajte. vlasništvo čisto i uredno 1/1 A beautiful house with three apartments is for sale, located in the tourist town of Privlaka near Zadar, just 450 meters from the beach. Each apartment has a separate entrance, providing complete privacy and comfort. The apartments consist of two bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, a spacious living room, a modern bathroom, a hallway, and a terrace or balcony, ideal for relaxation and enjoying the fresh air. The yard of the house is carefully landscaped and full of greenery, creating an oasis of peace and privacy. Parking is secured in the courtyard of the building, which is a great advantage for both owners and guests. The house is ideal for those looking for a peaceful and relaxed life near the sea or as an investment for tourist rentals. Located in a quiet tourist environment, this property provides everything needed for a pleasant and carefree stay. The proximity to the beach allows for quick and easy access to seaside fun, while the beautifully landscaped yard offers the perfect place for relaxation and socializing. Don't miss the opportunity to purchase this extraordinary property that offers everything you need for comfortable living or successful tourist business in the beautiful tourist town of Privlaka. For additional information and to arrange a viewing, please feel free to contact us.
